Author: katebishophawkguy
Text: i'll restrict sometimes and gain and then out of nowhere suddenly lose 3lbs over night

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: My scale weight can fluctuate by a few pounds depending on the water in my body and stuff working it’s way through my digestive system, and that’s enough to hide any actual change in my fat/muscle weight for a couple weeks worth of loss.   Over longer periods (like, a few weeks) it usually works itself out and the loss shows up. A squiggly stair-step down instead of a straight line. In the short-term, the uncertainty and nonlinearity makes me sad-angry sometimes, and there’s nothing for it but to wait. It can feel like my body is betraying me, but really it is doing its very best to take care of me, just like always. <3
